english.segment1: In to Your hands. I commit again. All I am. For You Lord
english.segment2: You hold my world in the palm of Your. Hands. And I am Yours. Forever
english.segment3: Jesus I believe in You. Jesus I belong to You. You're the reason that I live. You're the reason that I sing. With all I am
english.segment4: I'll walk with You. Wherever You go. Through tears and Joys. I'll trust in You
english.segment5: And I will live in all of Your ways. Your promises. Forever
english.segment6: Jesus I believe in You. Jesus I belong to You. You're the reason that I live. The reason that I sing. With all I am
english.segment7: I will woship. I will worship You(x2)
english.segment8: Jesus I believe in You. Jesus I belong to You. You're the reason that I live. The reason that I sing
english.segment9: Jesus I believe in You. Jesus I belong to You. You're the reason that I live. The reason that I sing. With all I am
